response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It's not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth every penny of its $10,000 price tag. I kindly invite you to consider this exceptional opportunity. If you're interested in making this acquisition, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 10000}
